question.text: Each of the compounds <math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math> and <math> <mrow>  <msub>   <mtext>K</mtext>   <mtext>2</mtext>  </msub>  <msub>   <mrow>    <mtext>PtCl</mtext></mrow>   <mtext>6</mtext>  </msub>  </mrow></math> were dissolved in water to make its <math><mn>0.01</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math> solution. The correct order of their increasing conductivity in solution is

options.text: <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mo>·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></math>

solution.text:
In aqueous solution 0.001 M , then complexes with dissociate to give the ions :
[Pt ( NH 3 ) 6 Cl 4 ]⇌ [Pt ( NH 3 ) 6 ] 4+  +  4Cl − ; 5 ions
[Cr(NH 3 ) 6 ]Cl 3 ⇌ [Cr ( NH 3 ) 6 ] 3+ +  3Cl − ; 4 ions
[Co(NH 3 ) 4 Cl 2 ]Cl⇌ [Co(NH 3 ) 4 Cl 2 ] + +  Cl - ; 2 ions
K 2 [PtCl 6 ]⇌ PtCl 6 2− +2K +  ; 3 ions
